title: Holiday gift idea: Treat a colleague, student, or blogger to unlimited website hosting with iBrave, now only $80
content:
Macworld

From small business owners to social media marketers and bloggers, a strong online presence is vital. If you know someone in need, take advantage of exclusive holiday pricing on a proven web hosting solution.

Through December 25, a lifetime subscription to iBrave Cloud Web Hosting (4.7-star rated!) is only $79.97 (reg. $899). This could be an ideal last-minute present for anyone looking for reliable, affordable website hosting.

iBrave provides load-balanced unlimited cloud hosting to ensure your site is never affected by site visitors’ activity and supplies one-click installation for more than 80 apps. It’s incredibly user-friendly and offers unlimited websites, subdomains, bandwidth, SSD storage, MySQL databases, and much more.

Anti-virus and anti-spam protection is also part of this package, giving users peace of mind that their sites will be secure. In addition, you can enjoy free daily backups, free website migration from other hosts, and iBrave’s impressive 99.9% uptime guarantee, which promises that sites will nearly always be live.

Help someone launch unlimited websites this holiday season with a lifetime subscription to iBrave Cloud Web Hosting, now just $79.97 through December 25 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific. No coupon is required for this exclusive offer!
